name: Untitled 4 (Sinus Rhythm)
description:
This piece worked its way out from a personal epiphanic discovery of the fundamental necessity of regularity. 

I recently suffered a cardiac arrest, requiring CPR and 2 defibrillator shocks. It was caused by a heart condition that I had, unknown, since birth. It caused an irregular heart rate. Since I had never experienced any other, this irregularity was what I conceived of as normal. 

I then underwent a procedure to correct the defect and return my heart to a regular rhythm.

Since then, I sense a heightened awareness of my internal rhythm; its difference; its regularity.



Click to change the palette.
